message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.SI, cs.NE 

The paper discusses the problem of learning collaborative behavior in multi-agent systems using deep reinforcement learning, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). The proposed algorithm involves communication between agents, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and multi-agent systems (cs.MA). The use of a connectivity network, modelled as a weighted graph, suggests that the paper may also fall under the category of social and information networks (cs.SI). Finally, the use of a diffusion process on the graph and the learning of the optimal graph topology through end-to-end training suggests that the paper may also fall under the category of neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE).
